attributes.title: Absolutely RIDDLED with glitches

attributes.title: Horrible Experience!!

My phone would frequently send notifications reminding me how bad safe spaces are and how they promote an oppressive agenda against The Straight White Man. -5/10 would not recommend downloading, i would say more but i keep getting emails asking me to ‚Äúfight the liberal mob‚Äù.
